--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: I will not be doing that, because I want everyoen to read all
of the posts like I do. I read everyone's posts, so everyone should
read mine, that's how I feel...
>   ----- Original Message -----
>   From: dcoburn
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>   Sent: Saturday, October 14, 2000 8:39 PM
>   Subject: Soon To Meet With The Transformers/Die Torca!!
>
>
>   This post regards these characters
>
>   Chars Involved(Besides mine): Torca
>
>   (I put this just incase anybody controlling the included
characters misses this post, that way, instead of somebody missing a
post which involves their char(s), they can just read this part and
say "Hey, this post involves me, I better read")
>
>   ::The Elements Group::
>
>              The plant command center was now 80% grown.
Ringalish� then gave out a command.
>
>              "Listen, now, we will go and seek these "transformers"
the Abyss have spoke of.  Covertax, you and I will go search.
Alvatar, I had intended to bring you, but, seeing that we are unable
to provide structural defence, I want you to stay behind and defend
the base.  Do you all understand?" He said.
>
>              Alvatar nodded and said yes, then got in a guard-like
stance.
>
>            Covertax grinned schemingly, and walked up to
Ringalish�.  Covertax and Ringalish� chose the element of air
to help
them travel, and before you could blink they gusted off like wind,
actually, as wind.
>   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>   ::Skulletron::
>
>          Skulletron's anger spurt went off again.  He stomped off
towards Torca, mechfluid leaking as he went.  Then, he saw Torca
talking to whoever(Spears and Smokescreen?).
>
>          Skulletron walked up to Torca, grabbed him by the neck,
lifted him up, and squeezed superly duperly hard, attempting to
either choke him to death or crush his neck.
>
>         eGroups Sponsor
